duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and assisting customers, handling transactions, and making purchase suggestions.
Working in various areas within the store to maintain high standards of appearance and provide friendly service.
Selling products, providing excellent customer care, and maintaining a quick pace while working as part of a team.
Thinking quickly, offering suggestions, and coming up with great ideas to solve problems.
Inspecting store facilities and equipment for safety, cleanliness, and proper working order.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
